items.content_html: react-pagination-with-dots is a lightweight and flexible pagination component designed for modern React applications. Built with simplicity and performance in mind, it allows for easy navigation between pages while providing a user-friendly, dot-based indicator to highlight the current page.

Built with simplicity and performance in mind, it allows for easy navigation between pages while providing a user-friendly, dot-based indicator to highlight the current page.

items.content_html: ESign - A fully frontend e-signature solution built with Vite and React. Create, sign, and manage documents effortlessly without a backend. Perfect for self-signing, reusable templates, role-based signing flows, and rapid deployment. The ultimate lightweight alternative to DocuSign/OpenSign!
items.title: Botapproved/ESign-React: ESign - A fully frontend e-signature solution built with Vite and React. Create, sign, and manage documents effortlessly without a backend. Perfect for self-signing, reusable templates, role-based signing flows, and rapid deployment. The ultimate lightweight alternative to DocuSign/OpenSign!

items.content_html: Nepali Datepicker React is a lightweight, highly customizable, and feature-rich datepicker component, specifically designed for handling Nepali dates in React.js applications. It offers seamless integration, intuitive user experience, and extensive configuration options.
items.title: tulsiojha/nepali-datepicker-react: Nepali Datepicker React is a lightweight, highly customizable, and feature-rich datepicker component, specifically designed for handling Nepali dates in React.js applications. It offers seamless integration, intuitive user experience, and extensive configuration options.

items.content_html: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
items.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
